price: 73. Totiyaki yango ezala bokundoli (тропа lolenge lifelo ekozala), mpe esalisa baye bazali na mposa na yango (тропа baye bazali na mobembo)

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

translations: for the wayfarers in the desert
